alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:59PM CDT until August 12 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Central Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/. * At 159 PM EDT/1259 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairmount, or 7 miles southeast of Dunlap, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Dunlap, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Walden, Lakesite, Fairmount, Flat Top Mountain, North Chickamauga Creek Gorge, and Harrison Bay State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
